Rank.Description: Increases your damage done by 1%.
Increases your damage done by 2%.
Increases your damage done by 3%.
Increases your damage done by 4%.
Increases your damage done by 5%.
Increases your Wisdom by 2%.
Increases your Wisdom by 4%.
Increases your Wisdom by 6%.
Increases your Wisdom by 8%.
Increases your Wisdom by 10%.

Reduces the cast time and mana cost of your Somatic Desecration by 10%.

Reduces the cast time and mana cost of your Somatic Desecration by 20%.

Increases your damage done, healing done, and absorption granted by 1%.
Increases your damage done, healing done, and absorption granted by 2%.
Increases your damage done, healing done, and absorption granted by 3%.
Increases your damage done, healing done, and absorption granted by 4%.
Increases your damage done, healing done, and absorption granted by 5%.

Ability.Description: Deals 122 Death damage over 15s. Restores 37 health to the Cleric at the same time.

Rank.Description: Increases damage done, healing done, and absorption granted by 2% while above 90% health.
Increases damage done, healing done, and absorption granted by 4% while above 90% health.
Increases damage done, healing done, and absorption granted by 6% while above 90% health.
Increases damage done, healing done, and absorption granted by 8% while above 90% health.
Increases damage done, healing done, and absorption granted by 10% while above 90% health.
Your Marrow Harvest increases non-Physical damage taken by 2.5% for 30s.
Your Marrow Harvest increases non-Physical damage taken by 5% for 30s.
Your Foul Growth triggers immediately if purged. Your Marrow Harvest triggers immediately if cleansed.
Grants a 50% chance whenever you cast a healing spell to apply Husk of Indifference to you.
Grants a 100% chance whenever you cast a healing spell to apply Husk of Indifference to you.
Increases the effect of Spell Power on your Marrow Harvest, Foul Growth, and Hideous Reconstruction by 4%.
Increases the effect of Spell Power on your Marrow Harvest, Foul Growth, and Hideous Reconstruction by 8%.
Increases the effect of Spell Power on your Marrow Harvest, Foul Growth, and Hideous Reconstruction by 12%.

Ability.Description: Summons an uncontrolled Beacon of Despair at the enemy's location. Applies Link of Despair, intercepting 50% of the damage taken by the Beacon. The Cleric takes 115% of the intercepted damage. Transfers threat generated by the Cleric to the Beacon. Deals 9 Death damage to attackers when the Beacon is hit. Lasts 5m.

Rank.Description: Reduces damage taken from your Links by 10%.
Reduces damage taken from your Links by 20%.
Reduces damage taken from your Links by 30%.

Ability.Description: Restores 35 to 39 health to up to 5 party or raid members. Restores 25% more health to targets of the Cleric's Links. Triggers Foul Growth.

Rank.Description: Your Foul Growth increases Maximum Health by 3% for 10s.
Your Foul Growth increases Maximum Health by 6% for 10s.
Increases your damage done and healing done with Marrow Harvest and Siphon Vitality by 5%.
Increases your damage done and healing done with Marrow Harvest and Siphon Vitality by 10%.
Increases your damage done and healing done with Marrow Harvest and Siphon Vitality by 15%.

Ability.Description: Deals 27 to 30 Death damage each time the Cleric is damaged. Lasts 30s.

Rank.Description: Grants a chance for your damaging abilities to apply Foul Growth to the targets of your Links, based on the intercept percentage of the Link.
Grants a chance for your damaging abilities to apply Foul Growth to the targets of your Links, based on twice the intercept percentage of the Link.

Ability.Description: Intercepts 10% of all healing received by the enemy. The Cleric receives 125% of the intercepted healing. Lasts 30s.

Rank.Description: Increases your damage done, healing done, and absorption granted with Death abilities by 4%.
Increases your damage done, healing done, and absorption granted with Death abilities by 8%.
Increases your damage done, healing done, and absorption granted with Death abilities by 12%.
Increases your damage done, healing done, and absorption granted with Death abilities by 16%.
Increases your damage done, healing done, and absorption granted with Death abilities by 20%.
Increases the effect of Spell Power on your Somatic Desecration, Loathsome Restoration, and Ghastly Restoration by 5%.
Increases the effect of Spell Power on your Somatic Desecration, Loathsome Restoration, and Ghastly Restoration by 10%.
Increases the bonuses granted by your Blights by 1%.
Increases the bonuses granted by your Blights by 2%.
Increases the bonuses granted by your Blights by 3%.

Ability.Description: Causes damaging abilities to restore 20 to 22 health to the Cleric. Lasts 30s.
Deals 262 to 262 Death damage to up to 3 enemies near the Cleric and the targets of the Cleric's Links.
